net.roydesign.mac
Interface AppleEventHandler

public interface AppleEventHandler

This interface is implemented by objects that wish to be notified of incoming Apple events. This is only currently implemented to handle the Preferences menu item on MRJ 3.0 and 3.1. The fact that it is public is just a byproduct of this implementation and by no means indicates any built-in support for handling arbitrary Apple events by your application.

Version:
MRJ Adapter 1.2

Method Summary
 short handleEvent(int event, int reply, int refcon)
          Handle an incoming Apple event.
 

Method Detail

handleEvent

                  int reply,
                  int refcon)
Handle an incoming Apple event.

Parameters:
event - a native pointer to the Apple event
reply - a native pointer to the event reply
refcon - the application-defined reference constant
